fields.description: Number of days before inserting a warning if the account amount was not transferred to main account
fields.label: Account Transfer Days Limit

fields.description: The parent account group to use when filtering the accounts that you want to check if their balance was transferred.
fields.label: Parent Account (Filter value)

fields.description:
The account numbers of the accounts that you want to exclude when checking if the account balance is transferred.
You can just enter the Parent account number of child accounts instead of entering the child account numbers one by one.
Example: 1111,1120,1130
fields.label: Account Numbers to Exclude in Filter
